verses.verse: Then <S%H935>came<s%> all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> unto <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>, and <S%H559>spake<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Behold, we are thy <S%H6106>bone<s%> and thy <S%H1320>flesh<s%>.

Also in time <S%H865%H8032>past<s%>, when <S%H7586>Saul<s%> was <S%H4428>king<s%> over us, thou wast he that leddest <S%H3318>out<s%> and broughtest <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to thee, Thou shalt <S%H7462>feed<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and thou shalt be a <S%H5057>captain<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

So all the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> to <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>; and <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>league<s%> with them in <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: and they <S%H4886>anointed<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
¶ <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign<s%>, and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.

In <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> over <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%>: and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> over all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H4428>king<s%> and his <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> unto the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%>, the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>: which <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Except thou take <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H5787>blind<s%> and the <S%H6455>lame<s%>, thou shalt not come <S%H935>in<s%> hither: <S%H559>thinking<s%>, <S%H1732>David<s%> cannot come <S%H935>in<s%> hither.
Nevertheless <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3920>took<s%> the strong <S%H4686>hold<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>: the same is the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> on that <S%H3117>day<s%>, Whosoever getteth <S%H5060>up<s%> to the <S%H6794>gutter<s%>, and <S%H5221>smiteth<s%> the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%>, and the <S%H6455>lame<s%> and the <S%H5787>blind<s%>, that are <S%H8130>hated<s%> of <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%>, he shall be chief and captain. Wherefore they <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H5787>blind<s%> and the <S%H6455>lame<s%> shall not <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%>.

So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H4686>fort<s%>, and <S%H7121>called<s%> it the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>. And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> from <S%H4407>Millo<s%> and <S%H1004>inward<s%>.
And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H1980>on<s%>, and grew <S%H1419>great<s%>, and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> was with him.

¶ And <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%>, and <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%>, and <S%H2796>carpenters<s%>, and <S%H7023%H68>masons<s%>: and they <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> an <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3045>perceived<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H3559>established<s%> him <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and that he had <S%H5375>exalted<s%> his <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> for his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel's<s%> sake.

¶ And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> him more <S%H6370>concubines<s%> and <S%H802>wives<s%> out of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%H310>after<s%> he was <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>: and there were yet <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters<s%> <S%H3205>born<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%>.

And these be the <S%H8034>names<s%> of those that were <S%H3209>born<s%> unto him in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; <S%H8051>Shammua<s%>, and <S%H7727>Shobab<s%>, and <S%H5416>Nathan<s%>, and <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>,
<S%H2984>Ibhar<s%> also, and <S%H474>Elishua<s%>, and <S%H5298>Nepheg<s%>, and <S%H3309>Japhia<s%>,
And <S%H476>Elishama<s%>, and <S%H450>Eliada<s%>, and <S%H467>Eliphalet<s%>.

¶ But when the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that they had <S%H4886>anointed<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, all the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>; and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of it, and went <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H4686>hold<s%>.
The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> also <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5203>spread<s%> themselves in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Shall I go <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>? wilt thou <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them into mine <S%H3027>hand<s%>? And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>, Go <S%H5927>up<s%>: for I will <S%H5414>doubtless<s%> <S%H5414>deliver<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> into thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1188>Baal-perazim<s%>, and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> them there, and <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath broken <S%H6555>forth<s%> upon mine <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me, as the <S%H6556>breach<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%>. Therefore he <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of that <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H1188>Baal-perazim<s%>.
And there they <S%H5800>left<s%> their <S%H6091>images<s%>, and <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H5375>burned<s%> them.
¶ And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> yet <S%H3254>again<s%>, and <S%H5203>spread<s%> themselves in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim<s%>.

And when <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, he <S%H559>said<s%>, Thou shalt not go <S%H5927>up<s%>; but fetch a <S%H5437>compass<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> them, and <S%H935>come<s%> upon them over <S%H4136>against<s%> the mulberry <S%H1057>trees<s%>.

And let it be, when thou <S%H8085>hearest<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of a <S%H6807>going<s%> in the <S%H7218>tops<s%> of the mulberry <S%H1057>trees<s%>, that then thou shalt <S%H2782>bestir<s%> thyself: for then shall the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> go <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee, to <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> did <S%H6213>so<s%>, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him; and <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> from <S%H1387>Geba<s%> until thou <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H1507>Gazer<s%>.
